EmailTemplate.name: NW - Is my verification information transferring over?
EmailTemplate.subject: Inquiry {!Case.CaseNumber}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Case.Contact},
During the transition of your accounts to Axos Bank we will not be receiving your security questions that are currently setup for your account.
We appreciate your business and commit to providing superior Banking products, support and services.
Best Regards,
{!User.FirstName} Axos Bank Customer Service
